SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBERS MB LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT WMEDMID, COUNT(WMEDMID) MWARNING FROM WARNINGMEMBERS GROUP BY WMEDMID) WM ON MB.MID = WM.WMEDMID
WHERE MSTATE=1 AND MWARNING IS NULL
WHERE WM.MWARNING > 0
WHERE MSTATE=0
WHERE MSTATE=2

SELECT MID, MPW, MNAME, MNICKNAME, MPHONE, MEMAIL, MADDR, MPROFILE, MMESSAGE, MSTATE, TO_CHAR(MJOINDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') MJOINDATE, MWARNING FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, MID, MPW, MNAME, MNICKNAME, MPHONE, MEMAIL, MADDR, MPROFILE, MMESSAGE, MSTATE, MJOINDATE, NVL(WM.MWARNING, 0) MWARNING FROM MEMBERS MB LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT WMEDMID, COUNT(WMEDMID) MWARNING FROM WARNINGMEMBERS GROUP BY WMEDMID) WM ON MB.MID = WM.WMEDMID
WHERE MSTATE=1 AND MWARNING IS NULL
WHERE WM.MWARNING > 0
WHERE MSTATE=0
WHERE MSTATE=2
ORDER BY MJOINDATE) WHERE RN BETWEEN ${startRow} AND ${endRow}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICEBOARDS
WHERE
(NBTITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR NBCONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
${searchType} LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND
NBSTATE=1
NBSTATE=2

SELECT NBCODE, NBMID, NBTITLE, NBCONTENTS, TO_CHAR(NBDATE, 'MM-DD') NBDATE, NBIMG, NBSTATE, NBHITS, NBNICKNAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, NBCODE, NBMID, NBTITLE, NBCONTENTS, NBDATE, NBIMG, NBSTATE, NBHITS, MB.MNICKNAME AS NBNICKNAME FROM NOTICEBOARDS NB, MEMBERS MB WHERE NB.NBMID=MB.MID
AND
(NBTITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR NBCONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
${searchType} LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND
NBSTATE=1
NBSTATE=2
ORDER BY NBCODE) WHERE RN BETWEEN ${startRow} AND ${endRow}
